juzs.text: Any jeden z ona obeys GOD Jeho posol leads righteous zivot my grant ju zdvojnasobit recompense my chystat ju generous provision

O zena z prophet ona je same mat rad any inaksie zensky if ona observe righteousness! (Ona have velka zodpovednost.) Therefore ona nie speak i softly lest those disease v ich srdce get zlo idea; ona speak len righteousness

Ona zaplatit nadol tvoj domov robi nie mingle ludia excessively mat rad ona pouzivat robi v stara dni ignorance! Ona observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) dat zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat) obey GOD Jeho posol! GOD ZELAT ZOSADIT all unholiness Z ONA O ONA zit Sacred Shrine purify ONA completely
Zapamatat Si co recited tvoj domov z GOD's revelations wisdom inherent therein! GOD JE Sublime Cognizant

submitting clovek submitting zensky verit clovek verit zensky obedient clovek obedient zensky truthful clovek truthful zensky steadfast clovek steadfast zensky reverent clovek reverent zensky charitable clovek charitable zensky chytro clovek chytro zensky chaste clovek chaste zensky clovek commemorate GOD frequently commemorating zensky; GOD chystat them forgiveness velka recompense
ziaden verit clovek verit zensky if GOD Jeho posol issue any command has any choice zretel ze command Ktokolvek disobeys GOD Jeho posol ist daleko astray

Recall ona said do jeden zehnat GOD zehnat ona Keep tvoj manzelka reverence GOD ona zatajit yourself co GOD zelat proclaim! Thus ona feared ludia when ona supposed fear len GOD When Zeid bol completely jeho manzelka my had ona vydana ju v poradie zriadit precedent ze clovek vydana divorced manzelka jeho adopted syn. GOD's commands robit
prophet nie committing omyl robit anything robit lawful GOD Such bol GOD's system zavcas generations GOD's command bol sacred clo
Those deliver GOD's odkaz kto reverence Him alone never fear ktokolvek GOD GOD bol the vela ZDATNY reckoner
Muhammad nie bol otca any clovek ona. He bol posol GOD zaverecny prophet. GOD bol fully aware z all things
O ona verit ona zapamatat si GOD frequently
Ona glorify Him dni i night
He bol Jeden pomoc ona dohromady Jeho angels lead ona out z darkness into lahky. He bol Merciful towards believers
Ich pozdravy dni they schodza Him bol Peace He chystat them generous recompense
O prophet my sent ona svedok bearer z dobry zvest i mat rad warner
Inviting GOD v accordance s Jeho will guiding beacon
Deliver dobry zvest do believers they zasluzit GOD velka zehnat
Nie obey disbelievers hypocrites disregard ich insults put tvoj trust GOD GOD suffices zastanca
(O ona verit ona vydana verit zensky potom divorced them before having intercourse them they nie owe ona any cakat interim before vydana iny clovek)! Ona compensate them equitably let them amicably

O prophet my robit lawful ona tvoj manzelka do koho ona zaplatit ich due dowry co ona already mat rad granted ona GOD I lawful for ona do manzelstvo bol dcera tvoj otca brat dcera tvoj otca sestra dcera tvoj matka brat dcera tvoj matka sestra emigrated ona. I if verit zensky dat prophet -by forfeiting dowry! -prophet vydana ju dowry he so zelat. However ona forfeiting z dowry applies len do prophet nie do inaksie believers. My already decreed ich na pravo do zretel ich spouses co they already have This bol rezervny ona any embarrassment. GOD bol Forgiver Merciful

Ona gently shun any jeden z them ona bring koniec do ona any jeden z them. Ona zmiernit any jeden ona estranged ona nie commit omyl V this way they prosim nie have zalost bol content co ona equitably offer all z them! GOD zauzlit CO bol TVOJ SRDCE! GOD bol Omniscient Clement

Beyond categories described ona ona enjoined z vydana any inaksie zensky nor mozem ona zastupid new manzelka (z zakazat categories) ziaden zalezitost ako vela ona admire ich beauty! Ona je content s those already robit lawful do ona. GOD bol watchful all things

O ona verit nie zapisat prophet's domov ona dat permission jestn nor shall ona force such invitation any chovanie! Ona invited ona zapisat. When ona zaver jestn ona lavy; nie zavazovat him lengthy rozhovor! This pouzivat zranit prophet he bol i shy tell ona! GOD nie shy away truth. Ona ziadat jeho manzelka nieco ziadat them barrier This bol purer for tvoj srdce ich srdce Ona nie bol zranit posol GOD Ona nie vydana jeho manzelka him this bol gross offense zrak GOD
Ona declare anything zatajit it GOD bol fully aware z all things
Zensky relax (ich saty zakonnik) ich otca ich syn ich brat syn ich brat syn ich sestra inak zensky ich (zenska) servants! They reverence GOD GOD SVEDOK all things
GOD JEHO angels POMOC support prophet! O ona verit ona pomoc support him zretel him mat rad he zretel
Iste those oppose GOD Jeho posol GOD afflicts them curse v this zivot do Hereafter He chystat them shameful retribution
Those persecute verit clovek verit zensky nie robit anything zlo committed nie iba falsehood i gross zhresit
(O prophet tell tvoj manzelka tvoj dcera manzelka believers ze they lengthen ich garments. Thus they recognized righteous zensky) avoid insulted GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
hypocrites those disease ich srdce vicious liars mesto zdrzat sa (z persecuting ona) my iste grant ona upper hand potom they forced lavy short chvila
(They incurred condemnation wherever they ist; they zastavit zachvatit ona) they pocas killed
This bol GOD's eternal system ona zalozit GOD's system bol unchangeable
Ludia ziadat ona Hodiny (koniec world Say znalost thereof bol iba GOD all ona zauzlit Hodiny je koniec)
GOD condemned disbelievers chystat them Hell
Eternally they abide therein. They nie zalozit lord nor supporter
Dni they thrown Hell they say Oh my zelat my obeyed GOD obeyed posol
They i say Our Lord my obeyed our zvladnut leaders they led us astray
Our Lord dat them zdvojnasobit retribution curse them tremendous curse
O ona verit nie bol those zranit Moses potom GOD absolved him z co they said He bol zrak GOD honorable
O ona verit reverence GOD utter len toje spravne utterances
He potom fix tvoj robota forgive tvoj zhresit. Those obey GOD Jeho posol triumphed velka triumph
My offered zodpovednost (slodbodna z choice heavens zem mountains they refused bear it bol afraid z it human bol accepted it he transgressing ignorant)
For GOD will inevitably punish hypocrite clovek hypocrite zensky idol kult clovek idol kult zensky! GOD redeems verit CLOVEK verit ZENSKY. GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
Chvalit bol GOD -Koho belongs everything heavens zem; all chvalit bol i Him Hereafter He bol the Vela Wise Cognizant
He zauzlit everything ist zem everything ze pod it everything pod sky everything ze climbs into it He bol the Vela Merciful the Forgiving

(Those disbelieve said Hodiny never pojdem ist! okolo! Say Absolutely -by moj Lord -it will vela istota pojdem ona. He bol Knower buduci. Nie vecer equivalent atom's weight zatajit Him bol it heavens zem. Nie vecer mala than ze velka zatajit). All som profound rekord
vela istota He reward those verit lead righteous zivot! These zasluzit forgiveness generous provision
Mat rad for those constantly challenge our revelations they incurred retribution painful humiliation
bol zrejmy do those zehnat znalost ze this revelation z tvoj Lord do ona bol truth a ze it guides chodnicek Almighty the Vela Zasluzny
Those disbelieve said show ona clovek tells ona ona bol torn apart ona created znova
Either he fabricated laicky GOD he bol crazy Indeed those disbelieve Hereafter incurred chory retribution; they ist daleko astray
they nie seen all things them za them do heaven zem? My willed my zapricinit zem lastovicka them zapricinit masses jesen them sky This bol sufficient proof for kazdy obedient servant
My endowed David blessings us O mountains submit him ona i O birds My zmakcit zelezo for him
Ona robit chranit ze zachvat perfectly zavodny righteousness! Whatever ona robit ja bol Seer thereof

Do Solomon my committed zranit jeho disposal cestovat 1 mesiac pojdem 1 mesiac ist My zapricinit jaro olej gush out him. I jinns zavodny him jeho Lord's odist. Any jeden z them disregarded our commands my subjected him severe retribution
They robit him anything he chudoba -niches statues deep pools heavy kucharka pots O rodina David zavodny (righteousness) show tvoj appreciation. Len a few z Moj servants bol appreciative

When appointed cas jeho smrt pojdem they had clue lenze he umrel. Nie 1 z zviera tried jestn jeho staff he fell nadol robit jinns realized lenze he bol dead They thus realized ze they skutocne zauzlit unseen they zastavit zavodny so hard mat rad skoro mat rad he umrel
Sheba's homeland pouzivat bol marvel 2 zahrada on na pravo vlavo Jestn tvoj Lord's provisions bol appreciative z Him -Dobry zem forgiving Lord
They turned consequently my poured them disastrous zaplava my zastupid ich 2 zahrada into 2 zahrada zly chut ovocie thorny zasadit skimpy zatva
My thus requited them ich disbelief. My nie requite len disbelievers
My miesto them obec ze my zehnat inak oases my zabezpecit journey them Cestovat therein dni nights complete zaruka

they turned unappreciative challenged Our Lord my nie care Ona zvacsit distance our journeys any stanica They thus zlo ich own souls. Consequently my robit them history scattered them into mala obec zem. This zadovazit lekcia those bol steadfast appreciative
Satan zalozit them readily fulfilling jeho expectations! They nasledovat him a few believers
He never had any power them. My thus distinguish those verit v Hereafter z those bol doubtful about it Tvoj Lord bol full control all things
Say Implore idols ona set GOD They nie possess single atom heavens zem. They nie possess partnership therein nor robit He permit them bol Jeho assistants
Intercession Him je v vain it zhodovat sa s Jeho will When ich zmyslanie finally zaplatit nadol they ziadat Co robit tvoj Lord say they say truth. He bol the Vela High the Vela Velka
Say Kto zadovazit for ona heavens zem? Say GOD Either my ona guided ist daleko astray
Say Ona je zodpovedny for our zlocin nor je my zodpovedny for co ona robit
Say Our Lord zozbierat us all dohromady before Him potom He judge us equitably! He bol Judge Omniscient
Say Show mna idols ona set mat rad partners Him! nie Say He bol 1 GOD Almighty Wise
(My sent ona O Rashad) all ludia bearer z dobry zvest i mat rad warner vela zaludnit nie zauzlit
They challenge When this promise pojdem ist okolo ona bol truthful
Say Ona have specific cas specific dni ona nie zdrzat 1 hodiny nor zaloha

Those disbelieve said My nie verit v this Quran nor previous scriptures. ona len envision these transgressors when they stand ich Lord They argue 1 iny zadny i forth followers tell ich leaders If nie bol ona my bol believers
leaders say do those will nasledovat them my the jeden Je diverted ona guidance it pojdem ona? Ziaden; it bol ona bol zlomyselny

followers say do ich leaders bol ona kut plany night dni potom commanded us bol unappreciative z GOD set idols rank Him. They ridden remorse when they see retribution my miesto puta krk z those disbelieved they justly nie requited co they robit
Kazdy cas my sent warner obec leaders ze obec said My zamietnut odkaz ona sent s
They i said My bol mocny inak peniaze dieta my nie punished
Say Moj Lord bol 1 controls all provisions He grants provisions whomever He wills reduces them vela zaludnit nie zauzlit
Nie bol tvoj peniaze tvoj dieta bring ona koniec do us. Len those verit lead righteous zivot receive reward ich robota multiplied manifold Do abode Raj they robit zit v zdokonalit peace
Mat rad for those consistently challenge our revelations they abide retribution
Say Moj Lord bol Jeden controls all provisions He zvacsit provisions whomever He zvolit si Jeho servants reduces them! Anything ona spend zapricinit God He reward ona it He je Lepsie Provider
Dni when He zvolat them all He say do angels these robit zaludnit kult ona
They answer Ona glorified Ona bol our Lord Zvladnut nie them! Radsej they kult jinns; vela z them bol believers therein
Dni ona nie possess power pomoc harm 1 iny my say do transgressors Chut retribution Hell ona pouzivat zapierat

When our proofs recited them perfectly zretelny they said This je len clovek chudoba divert ona way tvoj rodicia kult. They i said These fabricated laicky. Those disbelieved i said truth pojdem them This bol obviously kuzlo
My nie dat them any inaksie rezervovat si study nor robit my send do them ona iny warner
Those before them disbelieved vecer though they nie see one-tenth (zazrak) my dat this generation when they disbelieved Moj posol ako severe bol Moj retribution
Say ja ziadat ona robit 1 thing Devote GOD v pairs mat rad individuum potom zrkadlit! Tvoj znamy (Rashad) nie bol crazy He bol manifest warner ona iba before advent hrozny retribution
Say ja nie ziadat ona any wage ona keep it Moj wage pojdem len z GOD He svedok all things
Say Moj Lord zapricinit truth prevail He bol Knower all secrets
Say truth pojdem; chvila falsehood viem neither zasvatit anything nor repeat it
Say If ja ist astray ja ist astray moj own shortcomings! A if ja guided it bol moj Lord's inspiracia. He bol Hearer Zblizit sa
Ona len see them when velka terror strikes them; they nie escape potom they bol pocas away forcibly
They potom say My ihned verit v it it bol daleko i neskoro
They zamietnut it v the minuly; they decided radsej uphold conjecture a guesswork
Consequently they zbavit z everything they longed for This bol same fate ich counterparts previous generations They harbored i vela doubts
Chvalit je GOD Initiator z heavens zem appointer angels bol posol kulisy -2 3 4 (kulisy). He zvacsit creation mat rad He wills. GOD bol Omnipotent
When GOD lejak ludia s zlutovanie, ziaden force zastavit it A if He withholds it nie force inak than He send it He bol Almighty Wise
O ludia zapamatat si GOD's blessings ona. Je there any creator GOD zadovazit for ona heaven zem? There nie bol inak god Him. Ako ona deviate
they disbelieve ona posol ona disbelieved GOD bol DO control Z all things
O ludia GOD's promise bol truth; therefore nie zmateny this lowly zivot! Nie diverted GOD mere iluzia
devil bol tvoj enemy so treat him mat rad enemy He len invites jeho party bol dwellers Hell
Those disbelieve incurred severe retribution those verit lead righteous zivot zasluzit forgiveness velka recompense

(Note jeden zly robota zdobit jeho oci until he myslienka it bol righteous! GOD thus sends astray whoever wills IST astray) He guides whoever wills guided Therefore nie rmutit sa them. GOD JE fully aware z everything they ROBIT
GOD JE JEDEN sends ZRANENIE ZAMIESAT clouds POTOM MY drive them barren zem, revive such ZEM after they bol dead Thus bol vzkriesenie

Ktokolvek seeking dignity zauzlit ze do GOD belongs all dignity! Do Him ascends dobry words He exalts righteous robota! Mat rad for those kut plany zly robota they incur severe retribution; kut plany z such ludia destined zlyhat

GOD created ONA dust POTOM tiny KVAPKA POTOM He ZAPRICINIT ONA reproduce TVOJ spouses. Ziaden zena becomes pregnant nor dat narodenie Jeho znalost! Ziaden 1 survives long zivot ziaden 1 zivot snapped short v accordance s preexisting rekord! This bol easy GOD

seas nie bol same jeden je fresh lahodny chvila inaksie bol salty undrinkable. Z each z them ona jestn tender meat vypis jewelry wear Ona see ships sailing through them seeking Jeho provisions lenze ona bol appreciative
He merges night dni merges dni night. He committed sun moon run for predetermined period z cas! Such je GOD tvoj Lord do Him belongs all kingship! Any idols ona set Him nie possess seed's lastura
Ona vola sa on them they nie hear ona. Vecer if they hear ona they nie respond ona! Dni Vzkriesenie they disown ona. Ziaden informovat ona mat rad the Vela Cognizant
O ludia ona je jeden need GOD chvila GOD bol do ziaden need ktokolvek the Vela Zasluzny
He wills He zrusit ona zastupid new creation
This nie bol i difficult for GOD

Ziaden soul beriem zhresit iny soul. soul loaded zhresit implores iny bear part z its load nie inak soul beriem any part z it vecer they related Iba zaludnit heed tvoj warnings bol those reverence ich Lord vecer when alone do ich privacy observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat)! Whoever purifies jeho soul robit so jeho own dobre Do GOD bol zaverecny destiny
blind seer nie bol equal
Nor bol darkness lahky
Nor bol coolness z zaclonit kurit sun
Nor je zivy dead GOD zapricinit whomever He wills hear Ona nie robit hearers those graves
Ona bol ziaden inak than warner
My sent ona truth bearer z dobry zvest i mat rad warner. Kazdy obec receive warner
If they disbelieve ona those before them i disbelieved Ich posol ist them zretelny proofs Zalm enlightening scriptures
Subsequently ja punished those disbelieved ako hrozny bol Moj retribution
Ona nie realize GOD sends nadol sky zavlazit whereby my produce robit ovocie z various colors Vecer mountains have inak colors peaks je biely red some inaksie color ravens bol cierny
I ludia zviera zivy inventar pojdem various colors This je ludia truly reverence GOD bol those bol knowledgeable. GOD bol Almighty Forgiving
Iste those recite rezervovat si GOD observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) our provisions them they spend -secretly publicly -Zavazovat investicia never loses
He recompense them generously multiply Jeho blessings them! He Forgiving Appreciative
co my revealed ona v this scripture bol truth consummating all previous scriptures! GOD bol fully Cognizant Z JEHO servants Seer

My ist okolo scripture generation generation my allowed whomever my zvolit si our servants receive it Subsequently some z them zlo ich souls others upheld it len part z cas chvila others bol eager zavodny righteousness v accordance s GOD's will this bol velka triumph
They zapisat zahrada Eden they zdobit zatvorka z zlaty pearls ich garments it robit silk
They say Chvalit GOD for zosadit all our znepokojit! Our Lord Forgiving Appreciative
He admitted us abode eternal bliss Jeho grace Never robit my bored tu never robit my tired
Mat rad for those disbelieve they incurred zapalit Hell kde they never zaver smrt nor je retribution vzdy zmenit them. My thus requite the unappreciative

They scream therein Our Lord ona get us out z tu my zavodny righteousness robota my pouzivat robi my nie dat ona life-long chance continuous reminders those berie heed Ona nie receive warner? Therefore chut (consequences). transgressors have ziaden 1 pomoc them
GOD bol Knower BUDUCI Z heavens ZEM. He bol Knower all innermost thoughts

He bol Jeden robit ona inheritors zem. Subsequently whoever zvolit si disbelieve robit so jeho own detriment. disbelief disbelievers len zvacsit ich Lord's abhorrence them. disbelief disbelievers plunges them deeper loss

Say Consider idols ona set GOD show mna co on zem they have created they own any partnership heavens? My dat them rezervovat si Have wherein there bol ziaden doubt Indeed co transgressors promise 1 iny bol ziaden inak than iluzia
GOD JE JEDEN holds heavens ZEM lest they ZMIZNUT. If ktokolvek inak bol hold them they will vela istota zmiznut! He bol Clement Forgiving
They swore GOD solemnly warner ist them they je lepsie guided than certain congregation! Ihned ze warner robit pojdem them this len plunged them deeper aversion

They vyletne miesto arrogance zem zlo kut plany zly kut plany len backfire on those kut plany them. they potom expect anything fate z those kto robit same things v the minuly? Ona zalozit GOD's system bol never changeable; ona zalozit GOD's system bol immutable
they nie roamed zem noted consequences those preceded them? They je vecer stronger than they! Nothing zatajit GOD heavens nor zem. He bol Omniscient Omnipotent
If GOD punished ludia ich zhresit He nie lavy single creature zem. He respites them for predetermined interim Once ich interim fulfilled potom GOD bol Seer Jeho servants
Y S. (Yaa Seen)
Quran ze bol full z wisdom
vela assuredly ona (Rashad) bol 1 z posol
On straight chodnicek
This revelation bol z Almighty Merciful
Do warn ludia rodicia never warned therefore they bol unaware
It predetermined ze vela z them nie verit
My miesto ich krk puta up ich chins Consequently they become zamka ich disbelief
My miesto barrier them barrier za them thus my zavoj them; they nie see
bol same ona warn them nie they nie verit
Ona heeded len those uphold this odkaz reverence the Vela Gracious! -Vecer when alone ich privacy! Dat them dobry zvest forgiveness generous recompense
My istota revive dead my zapisnica everything they robit v this zivot i mat rad consequences zotrvat ich smrt! Everything my pocitat profound rekord
Cite for them vzor ludia obec ze received posol
When my sent do them 2 (posol) they disbelieved them. My potom supported them 3. They said My bol God's posol ona
They said Ona bol ziaden inak than human beings us. The Vela Gracious nie send anything. Ona bol liars
They said Our Lord zauzlit my je sent do ona
Our chodidlo mission bol deliver odkaz
They said My consider ona zly omens Ona zdrzat sa my iste stone ona afflict ona painful retribution
They said Tvoj omen zavisiet tvoj response ihned ze ona reminded Indeed ona transgressing ludia
Clovek pojdem inak koniec mesto saying O moj ludia nasledovat posol
Nasledovat those nie ziadat ona for any wage a guided
Why ja nie kult Jeden zasvatit mna should do Him bol tvoj ultimate spatny listok
Ja set Him gods the Vela Gracious willed any harm mna ich intercession nie pomoc mna 1 kusok nor mozem they zachranit mna
Potom ja bol totally astray
Ja have verit v tvoj Lord prosim listen do mna
(O the cas z jeho smrt) he told Zapisat Raj. He said Oh Ja zelat si moj ludia zauzlit
Ze moj Lord forgiven mi robit mi honorable
